sections.heading: Abandonment of animal at boarding facility or veterinarian facility3-1310
sections.text: Abandonment of animal at boarding facility or veterinarian facilityWhen a small animal left at a boarding facility or any animal left at a veterinarian facility has not been reclaimed within the period of time previously agree

sections.heading: of animal at boarding facility or veterinarian facility
sections.text: of animal at boarding facility or veterinarian facility
